revision.text:
==Note== These are base prices.
Items will increase in price when bought in bulk.
Most items will decrease with Pokémon's defeated with the exception of the [[masterball]] which will permanently increase in price on any purchase. ==Locations and items== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Region !! City Name !! Item 1 !! Item 2 !! Item 3 !! Item 4 !! Item 5 !! Item 6 !! item 7 |- | Kanto || | Viridian City || [[Pokeball]]
